description: Sixty million years ago, Iceland’s deep plume fueled massive eruptions across the North Atlantic. Cambridge scientists discovered hidden weak zones in Earth’s crust that funneled the plume’s heat, explaining volcanic fields like the Giant’s Causeway. These ancient scars still shape today’s earthquakes and geothermal energy across Britain and Ireland.
title: Iceland Plume Discovery Reveals Ancient Volcanic Funnels Across North Atlantic

description: Apple on Monday released iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe worldwide. First previewed at WWDC 2025, the updates bring Liquid Glass technology, redesigned lockscreen options, feature upgrades, and Apple Intelligence AI tools to compatible devices. Check the compatible devices and how to download the update on iPhone, iPad, or Mac devices.
title: iOS 26 Update Released Alongside iPadOS 26 and macOS Tahoe: Check Eligible Models, How to Download

description: A Southwest Research Institute study reveals that chasing interstellar comets like 3I/ATLAS is achievable with current rockets and instruments. Such missions could collect data on comet nuclei and comae, providing clues to the formation of other star systems. International collaborations make these rare, high-value missions increasingly realistic.
title: Scientists Propose Space Missions to Chase Down Interstellar Comets

description: Huawei Watch GT 6 and Watch GT 6 Pro are set to launch on September 19 by the Chinese tech giant. The new smartwatches will succeed last year’s Watch GT 5 series. However, the company might unveil another smartwatch during its upcoming event. The alleged renders of the Huawei Watch Ultimate 2 have been leaked online, suggesting the same.
title: Huawei Watch Ultimate 2 Design Renders Leaked, Could Launch Soon

description: iPhone 17 series is currently up for pre-orders in several global markets, including India. Now, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo states that the first weekend pre-orders for the iPhone 17 series surpassed iPhone 16. According to Kuo, pre-orders for the iPhone Air appear lower than last year’s iPhone 16 Plus. The iPhone 17 Pro Max is said to be the most in-demand model
title: iPhone 17 Series Outpaces iPhone 16 in Demand While iPhone 17 Pro Max Tops Pre-Orders, Analyst Says

description: Insomniac Games will reportedly release Marvel's Wolverine in 2026, a new report has claimed. Citing sources familiar with the matter, the report also said that the studio was still working on the Venom project.
title: Marvel's Wolverine Will Reportedly Launch in 2026; Insomniac's Venom Game in 'Active Development'

description: US President Donald Trump has appealed a court ruling blocking his attempt to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook. The appeal comes days before an expected Fed rate cut, adding uncertainty to both traditional markets and crypto. Allegations against Cook involve mortgage misrepresentation, which she denies. The case raises questions about Fed independence and could influence crypto sentiment as investors watch how monetary policy and political pressure intersect.
title: US President Donald Trump Challenges Block on Removing US Fed’s Lisa Cook

description: Apple’s iPhone 16 was the best-selling smartphone in the second quarter of 2025 (Q2 2025), according to Counterpoint Research’s Global Smartphone Model Sales Tracker. The top three spots in the list were taken by the iPhone 16 series handsets, where the iPhone 16 Pro Max came in at the second position and the iPhone 16 Pro took the third spot.
title: iPhone 16 Remained Top Selling Smartphone For Second Consecutive Quarter Globally: Report

description: After the launch of the iPhone 17 series, attention has shifted to the iPhone 18 lineup, with rumours hinting at a narrower cutout. Apple is reportedly not using under-display Face ID or front cameras in the iPhone 18 series. Apple was rumoured to shrink the Dynamic Island on the iPhone 17 series, but all four models retained the same Dynamic Island design as their predecessors.
title: iPhone 18 Series Tipped to Feature Smaller Dynamic Island, Might Launch Without Under-Display Face ID

description: A leaked image on Weibo, believed to show the OnePlus 15, reveals a rectangular rear camera module with three sensors and an LED flash. The phone is seen in black, titanium, and purple colourways, with earlier leaks mentioning Absolute Black, Dune, and Mist Purple marketing names. It may feature a 6.78-inch 1.5K 165Hz LTPO OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC, 7,000mAh battery with 120W charging, and triple 50-megapixel rear cameras including a periscope lens with 3x zoom.
title: OnePlus 15 Leaked Image Hints at Redesigned Camera Module, Three Colourways

description: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE in India, priced at Rs. 59,999 for 8GB+128GB, Rs. 65,999 for 8GB+256GB, and Rs. 77,999 for 8GB+512GB. Buyers of the 256GB model get a free upgrade to 512GB. Additional offers include Rs. 5,000 bank cashback and up to 24 months no-cost EMI. Globally unveiled earlier this month, the phone features an Exynos 2400 chip, 4,900mAh battery, 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit, and Android 16-based One UI 8 with seven years of updates.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Launched in India With 6.7-Inch AMOLED Screen, 50-Megapixel Camera: Price, Features

description: Apple announced the iPhone 17 series last week. The new iPhone models arrive with iOS 26 pre-installed, and the final version of the software update will be available to download today. It brings a Liquid Glass UI and includes new Apple Intelligence capabilities. The iPhone SE (2nd generation) or later are confirmed to get the latest operating system. Here are the new key features for your iPhone.
title: iOS 26 to Be Available Today: Here Are 6 Biggest New Features to Try First

description: The London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) has executed its first blockchain-powered fundraising through its new Digital Markets Infrastructure (DMI) platform. Developed in partnership with Microsoft, the platform facilitated a private fundraise by MembersCap. The LSEG is the first global exchange to integrate blockchain across issuance, trading, and settlement, aiming to modernise private market operations, reduce settlement times, and improve investor access.
title: London Stock Exchange Completes First Blockchain-Powered Fundraising via DMI Platform

description: India’s draft National Data Centre Policy 2025 reportedly proposes tax exemptions of up to 20 years for developers meeting targets on capacity, efficiency, and jobs. The incentives, offered as GST input tax credit on capital assets, aim to boost investment in data centres. The move comes as OpenAI and others plan large-scale projects, aligning with India’s broader AI ecosystem push.
title: MeitY Proposes 20-Year Tax Holiday for Data Centres to Boost Investment: Report

description: Samsung has begun rolling out the Android 16-based One UI 8 update to the Galaxy S25 series, starting with South Korea. Beta participants are receiving the global stable firmware version S93xNKSU5BYI3, with a 555MB download size for the S25 Ultra. The update will soon extend to non-beta users and expand internationally, though timelines for other Galaxy models remain unconfirmed.
title: Samsung Begins Rolling Out One UI 8 Update to the Galaxy S25 Series

description: The release of Treasure Hunters Season 1 on JioHotstar has already created buzz among adventure lovers and streaming audiences. With its mix of mystery, teamwork, and treasure-hunting thrills, the show is expected to gain popularity across social media and review platforms. Its launch adds to JioHotstar’s growing lineup of original content in 2025.
title: Treasure Hunters Season 1 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Written by Aditya Chopra, War 2 is an action-thriller movie starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr. NTR., and Kiara Advani in the lead roles. The movie will stream soon on Netflix.
title: War 2 OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Xiaomi 17 series specifications have been surfacing online for months. Earlier rumoured to arrive as the Xiaomi 16 series, the launch of the upcoming Xiaomi 17 lineup was recently confirmed by a company executive online, along with a few of its specifications. It is confirmed to include the standard Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max. Now, an alleged render of the Xiaomi 17 Pro Max has been leaked, which hints that the handset might come with a secondary display on the back.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max Leaked Image Reveals Rear Display in a Nod to the 11 Ultra Ahead of September Debut

description: Zepto rolled out the second edition of its Fastest Sale Ever in India starting September 11, with discounts of up to 90 percent on personal gadgets, electronics and a wide variety of other products. Positioned ahead of the festive rush, the sale highlights attractive offers with fast delivery, while select bank cards provide perks such as instant discount and no-cost EMI. Buyers can get Apple's AirPods 4 TWS headset for as low as Rs. 9,999.
title: Zepto Fastest Sale Ever: Apple AirPods 4 Price Drops to Rs 9,999; Check Top Deals on Electronics, Accessories

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is set to kick off on September 23 for all shoppers. A slew of Motorola smartphones like Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Edge 60 Fusion, Moto G96 5G,  and Razr 60 are confirmed to see price cuts during the sale.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025: Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Edge 60 Fusion, Moto G96 5G and More to Get Discounts

description: iQOO 15 will feature a 2K Samsung Everest AMOLED display supporting up to 6,000 nits, high colour accuracy, contrast, and AR anti-reflection coating, according to the company. Powered by a Snapdragon chipset, the Neo 15 will launch with the industry’s largest 8K vapour chamber cooling system for improved thermal management. A leaked image shows a red-to-white gradient back, curved edges, a flat screen, and a large rear camera module, hinting at a new design direction.
title: iQOO 15 Live Image Hints at Design; Confirmed to Feature 2K Samsung AMOLED Display

description: Resident Evil Requiem is coming to Nintendo Switch 2, Capcom has announced. The ninth main instalment in the survival horror series will release on Switch 2 on January 27, 2026, the same day it launches on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X. Capcom will also release Resident Evil 7: Biohazard and Resident Evil Village on the Switch 2 the same day.
title: Resident Evil Requiem, Resident Evil 7: Biohazard and Resident Evil Village Are Coming to Switch 2 Next Year

description: Noise is preparing to launch a new product in its Master Series, Gadgets 360 has learnt from sources. The upcoming device is said to come with Dynamic EQ technology, which can adjust audio in real-time based on volume and environment. A leaked image of the product indicates that it could be offered in a white shade, among other colourways
title: [Exclusive] Noise to Launch Flagship Master Series Over-Ear Headphones With Dynamic EQ

description: Google has unveiled VaultGemma, a one-billion-parameter privacy-focused AI model trained using differential privacy techniques to prevent memorisation of sensitive data. By adding calibrated noise during training, the model avoids exposing personal identifiers like addresses or credit cards. While this approach reduces accuracy and increases compute costs, it shows privacy-preserving AI is feasible, potentially setting a new industry standard for safeguarding user data.
title: Google VaultGemma: 5 Things to Know About the AI Model That Puts Privacy First

description: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC was earlier anticipated to be unveiled as the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2. Now, Qualcomm has confirmed that the next Snapdragon 8-series mobile SoC is going to be called Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5. Along with the announcement, the company has also given an explanation regarding the naming of its mobile chipset.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Confirmed to Launch as Qualcomm's Upcoming Flagship Mobile Chipset

description: Vivo Y31 series, comprising the Vivo Y31 5G and the Vivo Y31 Pro 5G, debuted in the Indian market on Monday. The two smartphones will be available in two colourways, along with two storage and RAM options. The standard model packs a 6500mAh battery with 44W Smart FlashCharge support. The company claims that the phone will be able to deliver three hours of video playback with 10 minutes of charging.
title: Vivo Y31 Pro 5G, Vivo Y31 5G Launched in India With 6,500mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera: Price, Features

description: Following the introduction of the iPhone 17 series last week, Apple plans to launch several more products by early 2026. As per a report, iPhone 17e, an iPad Pro with an M5 chipset, AirTag 2, and an updated Apple Vision Pro are all expected to be announced early next year. The company could also introduce a new product category in the form of its highly-anticipated smart home hub.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans to Launch iPhone 17e, MacBook Air M5, and More Products by Early 2026

description: Given their higher asking price, the premium segment has plenty of options to choose from. There are compact smartphones, full-size performance-oriented devices and even foldables! Also available at this attractive price point are an older generation of devices with reduced price tags.
title: Best Mobiles Under Rs. 60,000 in India: From iPhone 16e to OnePlus 13s, and More

description: Bitcoin traded above $116,400 (roughly Rs. 1.02 crore) on Monday as traders awaited the Fed’s rate cut decision. Ethereum consolidated at $4,660 (roughly Rs. 4.11 lakh), while Solana and BNB showed strong momentum. Market optimism is supported by ETF inflows, stablecoin supply growth, and whale accumulation. Analysts highlight $117,500 as key resistance for Bitcoin, with support at $115,000, as broader sentiment across altcoins remains bullish.
title: Bitcoin Steadies Above $116,400 as Ether and Other Altcoins Show Resilience

description: Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale 2025 starts in India on September 23, with early access for Flipkart Plus and Black users. The sale will offer discounts, bank deals, and exchange offers across products, including Realme phones. The Realme GT 7T will be priced at Rs. 30,999 during the sale, the Realme P4 Pro at Rs. 19,999, and the Realme 15 5G at Rs. 21,999. The newly launched Realme P3 Lite 5G, starting at Rs. 12,999, will also be on sale, with offers bringing the price down to Rs. 9,499.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025: Discounts on Realme GT 7T, Realme 15, Realme P4 Pro and More Models Revealed

description: Nothing has announced offers on Phone 3a Pro, CMF Phone 2 Pro, Nothing Phone 3, and other products that will be available during the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale. Customers will be able to take advantage of lucrative discounts, among other offers. Offers will also be valid on TWS earphones, including Nothing Ear, Ear (a) and Ear Open.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: Nothing Announces Offers on Phone 3a Pro, CMF Phone 2 Pro, Nothing Ear, and More

description: Oppo F31 series debuted in the Indian market on Monday. The new smartphone lineup includes the Oppo F31 5G, Oppo F31 Pro 5G, and the Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G. The standard and the Pro model sport 6.5-inch AMOLED displays with a 120Hz refresh rate. Whereas the Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G features a larger, 6.8-inch AMOLED display.
title: Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery Alongside Oppo F31 Pro 5G, F31 5G: Price, Features

description: Oppo has confirmed the arrival of the Oppo Find X9 series in its home country. The company has also shared camera samples and posters on the Chinese microblogging platform, revealing the camera advancements of the Oppo Find X9 Pro.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro Camera Samples Teased; Oppo Find X9 Series Confirmed to Launch in October

description: Samsung’s Galaxy M36 is one of the more confusing smartphones we have come across this year. The M36 aims to outdo its fairly tolerable predecessor, the Galaxy M35, with a cosmetic upgrade. This decision results in a smaller battery, which leaves it trailing behind its competitors.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 Review: All Style, No Substance?

description: Square Enix has confirmed the Final Fantasy Remake trilogy will eventually make its way to Nintendo Switch 2 and Xbox Series S/X, in addition to PS5 and PC. Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade, the expanded version of first game in the new trilogy, is coming to Switch 2 and Xbox on January 22.
title: Final Fantasy Remake Trilogy Is Coming to Switch 2 and Xbox, Starting With First Game Next Year

description: Google Gemini’s iOS app climbed to the top spot on the App Store’s free apps chart in several countries on Friday. Recent additions, including the “Nano Banana” image editing tool, visual guidance in Gemini Live, and a redesigned prompt bar, may have boosted its appeal. The app currently ranks number one in India and the US.
title: Google Gemini Ranks at the top of the iOS App Store, Overtakes ChatGPT for the First Time

description: Nothing Co-founder Akis Evangelidis confirmed that the Nothing Phone 3 will be available in India starting at Rs. 34,999 with special exchange offers for Phone 1 and Phone 2 users during Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale 2025. The phone’s regular prices are Rs. 79,999 and Rs. 89,999 for the 12GB + 256GB and 16GB + 512GB variants, respectively. He noted the upgrade offer is especially relevant for Phone 1 users, who won’t get the Android 16-based Nothing OS 4.0 update.
title: Nothing Phone 3 to Go on Sale at Rs 34,999 During Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: Here's How to Avail of This Offer

description: Realme P3 Lite 5G has been launched in India with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and a 6,000mAh battery. It features a 32-megapixel rear camera and an 8-megapixel selfie camera. The smartphone offers an IP64 rating for dust and water resistance.
title: Realme P3 Lite 5G Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Features

description: Apple is set to release its iOS 26 update for iPhone today (Monday). It will be available for supported iPhone models globally and in India. The new iPhone 17 series will also run the OS out-of-the-box. iOS 26 introduces a new Liquid Glass UI. It can reflect and refract light, thus reacting to its surrounding visual elements. There are new customisation options and additions to the Apple Intelligence suite.
title: iOS 26 Update to Be Out Today: How to Download, India Release Time, Supported iPhones and More

description: The iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air were launched in India and the global markets last week. While Apple says their deliveries will begin on September 19, some of the models are now facing delivery delays. Apple's website indicates extended delivery estimates, and Indian retailers are reportedly experiencing stock shortages.
title: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air Shortage in India Leads to Order Delays
